text: is there anyway to upload images, gifs etc inside the "images" folder for a theme via the online interface ?
currently the design manager doesn’t support that. It’s something we’re thinking about though. In the mean time it’s possible to do this using the CMS CLI.
Are you using and APIKEY in your HubSpot.config.yml by chance?

~I'm getting started with the drag and drop boilerplate, and changes to _typography.css base font sizes don't seem to be affecting my page (using the template preview). What am I missing?~  moved to drag-and-drop channel
Yeah, I haven’t bothered to switch to the new auth method, but ti sounds like I probs should. Do you recommend?
